document_data.name: Tebryn Dhialael
document_data.mainbody: '''Tebryn Dhialael''', also known as '''Dalael''' He was later known as '''Kirenkirsalai''' or '''Kire'''.<ref>{{Cite dragon/428/Backdrop: Westgate}}
document_data.Description: Tebryn's skin was not as dark as a normal [[drow]]'s but enough to betray his origin, as did his white hair. Contrary to this, his blue eyes were clearly a gift from his human parent. He had a strong and slender build like most half-elves.
document_data.Relationships: Kire was obsessed with Myrin although the nature of his interest was never clear. It may have been related to family ties to [[House Darkdance]]{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|5345}} or may have been due to Myrin's powerful [[spellscar]].
